name: Mule deer and white-tail deer hybrid data
description: Genetic analysis of mule deer and white-tail deer in Alberta at 40 species discriminating SNP (single nucleotide polymorphism) loci. Included in this dataset is the genotype file and associated R script demonstrating analyses for the simulation aspect of the study. Empirical results can be reproduced using the genotypes and adapting the R code as needed.

citation.text: Russell et al. Evaluating introgressive hybridization of mule and white-tailed deer in Western Canada. Evolutionary Applications (in review)

distribution.name: hyb_detection_efficacy_2021.R
distribution.description: Simulating hybrids and analyzing the assignment results from STRUCTURE and NewHybrids
